column3: Rebased, squashed, and updated to take advantage of `IsSmallInteger` from #13194
I am generally a concept NACK on changes like this; IMO the review burden for refactoring consensus-critical code typically outweighs the benefits.
> I am generally a concept NACK on changes like this; IMO the review burden for refactoring consensus-critical code typically outweighs the benefits.\n\nAgree, seems to risky, closing.
Might as well return this directly.
